wikipedia_page.main: Mervyn Baggallay (7 December 1887 – 19 March 1961) was an English cricketer. He played eight first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club in 1911.

response: Baggallay married, firstly, Kathleen Constance Charlotte FitzGerald Murphy in 1910 and secondly Phyllis Mildred Harriet Ford in 1922. He had three children by his first wife. His brother Mervyn Baggallay played cricket for Cambridge University, and a cousin Thomas Baggallay played for Surrey.
